recipes.name: Meat Sauce
recipes.description: A classic meat sauce that's perfect for pasta.
instructions: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and garlic and sauté until soft.
Add the ground beef and brown it until fully cooked.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, and oregano. Let it simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve with pasta.

recipes.name: Oven-Baked Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy chicken baked in the oven with spices.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place the chicken breasts in a baking dish and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with paprika, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Bake in the oven for 25-30 minutes or until the chicken is cooked through.

recipes.name: Fried Pork
recipes.description: A quick and tasty dish with pork.
instructions: Mix soy sauce, honey, garlic, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Marinate the pork in the mixture for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a frying pan and fry the pork until golden brown and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes.

recipes.name: Steak with Vegetables
recipes.description: A simple steak served with sautéed vegetables.
instructions: Heat oil in a frying pan. Cook the steaks for 3-4 minutes on each side or until desired doneness.
Remove the steaks and let them rest.
Add more oil to the pan and sauté the vegetables for 5-7 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve the steaks with the sautéed vegetables.

recipes.name: Meatballs
recipes.description: Homemade meatballs that are perfect with sauce and potatoes.
instructions: Combine breadcrumbs and milk in a bowl. Let it sit for 10 minutes.
Add ground meat, onion, egg, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Shape the mixture into balls.
Heat butter in a frying pan and fry the meatballs for 8-10 minutes or until cooked through.

recipes.name: Oven-Baked Salmon
recipes.description: A simple and flavorful dish where the salmon is baked with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place the salmon fillets in a baking dish. Drizzle with olive oil and season with dill, salt, and pepper.
Place the lemon slices on top of the salmon.
Bake in the oven for 15-20 minutes or until the salmon is cooked through.

recipes.name: Fried Cod
recipes.description: A light and fresh dish featuring fried cod and lemon.
instructions: Season the cod fillets with salt and pepper. Dredge them in flour.
Heat butter in a frying pan and fry the cod for 4-5 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.name: Fish Casserole
recipes.description: A creamy fish casserole that pairs perfectly with potatoes or rice.
ingredients: 500 g fish fillets (e.g., salmon or cod)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
Sauté the onion in butter in a frying pan until soft.
Place the fish fillets in a baking dish. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour over the fish.
Top with grated cheese and bake in the oven for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.name: Grilled Mackerel
recipes.description: A flavorful grilled dish featuring mackerel and lemon.
instructions: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Marinate the mackerel fillets in the mixture for 30 minutes.
Grill the fillets for 5-7 minutes on each side or until cooked through.

recipes.name: Tuna Salad
recipes.description: A quick and tasty tuna salad perfect for sandwiches or as a spread.
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, mustard, onion, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Serve on bread or lettuce leaves.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing Mediterranean salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta.
instructions: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, bell pepper, feta, and olives in a large bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.
Toss gently and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: A classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, Parmesan, and croutons.
instructions: In a large salad bowl, toss the romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add Parmesan and croutons, tossing gently to coat.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple Italian salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate, alternating them with basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.
Serve as a fresh starter or side.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A hearty salad with quinoa, vegetables, and a light lemon dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine cooked quinoa, cucumber, bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.

recipes.name: Avocado & Corn Salad
recipes.description: A fresh and creamy salad with avocado, corn, and lime dressing.
ingredients: 1 cup corn kernels (fresh, canned, or frozen)
instructions: In a large bowl, combine avocado, corn, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.
In a small bowl, whisk together lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle dressing over the salad and toss gently.

recipes.name: Chocolate Mousse
recipes.description: A rich and creamy chocolate mousse made with dark chocolate.
instructions: Melt the chocolate in a heatproof bowl over simmering water. Let it cool slightly.
Whisk the egg yolks into the melted chocolate until smooth.
In a separate bowl, whip the cream until soft peaks form, then fold into the chocolate mixture.
Beat the egg whites with sugar until stiff peaks form and fold into the chocolate mixture.
Spoon into serving glasses and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.

recipes.name: Apple Crumble
recipes.description: A warm, comforting dessert with baked apples and a crispy crumble topping.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Place the sliced apples in a baking dish and sprinkle with half of the sugar and cinnamon.
In a bowl, mix flour, oats, remaining sugar, and melted butter until crumbly.
Spread the crumble mixture over the apples.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until the topping is golden and the apples are tender.

recipes.name: Panna Cotta
recipes.description: A classic Italian dessert with a creamy vanilla flavor.
instructions: In a saucepan, heat cream and sugar until the sugar dissolves, then remove from heat and add vanilla extract.
In a small bowl, sprinkle gelatin over cold water and let it sit for 5 minutes.
Add the gelatin mixture to the cream and stir until combined.
Pour into serving glasses and refrigerate for at least 4 hours until set.

recipes.name: Berry Parfait
recipes.description: A light dessert layered with fresh berries and whipped cream.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
instructions: In serving glasses, layer whipped cream, berries, and granola.
Repeat the layers as desired.
Top with a final layer of berries and a dollop of whipped cream.
Serve immediately or refrigerate for up to 1 hour before serving.

recipes.name: Lemon Sorbet
recipes.description: A refreshing sorbet with a zesty lemon flavor, perfect for hot days.
instructions: In a saucepan, combine sugar and water and heat until the sugar dissolves. Let it cool.
Add lemon juice and zest to the cooled syrup.
Pour the mixture into a shallow container and freeze for 1 hour.
Stir the mixture with a fork to break up ice crystals, then freeze for another 1-2 hours or until firm.
Serve in scoops.
